bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.description: Previously all ND4J tests were passing (Wednesday/Thursday last week) but now we have a number of failures. I'm seeing the same failures on two different machines (windows) both built from scratch on current master (not on any branches). <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2360237/52922414-354deb80-3375-11e9-89ef-789b8c90e1b9.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
